A. Sutherland
S. Wermter
dcterms:description: The OMG-Emotion Behavior Dataset is a long-term multi-modal corpus for sentiment analysis, constructed by selecting videos with emotional behaviors from YouTube. It includes utterances annotated with arousal/valence values and discrete emotion labels.
dcterms:title: OMG-Emotion Behavior Dataset
